channel.title: Projects on Kevin Suñer
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Kevin Suñer

item.title: Zenimmit
item.description: A configurable cli tool to help you write better git commit messages.

item.title: Gopa
item.description: A cross-platform terminal playground for the Go programming language to experiment, prototype and get instant feedback.

item.title: SIMPLEstack
item.description: A content management system conceived to be used as boilerplate to create full-stack web applications in Go.

item.title: Kilo Editor
item.description: Antirez’s Kilo text editor built following Snaptoken’s “Build your own text editor” booklet.

item.title: RunGo
item.description: A cross-platform desktop playground for the Go programming language to experiment, prototype and get instant feedback.

item.title: Bloggo
item.description: An static site generator built for individuals that prioritize content over features.
